headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy Production
summary: Change Foods receives investment to scale up its precision-fermentation dairy alternative production.

headline: Bolt Threads Partners with Luxury Brand for Mylo Mushroom Leather Bags
summary: Bolt Threads' Mylo material is adopted by a major luxury brand for a new line of bags.

headline: Solar Foods Begins Commercial Production of Solein Protein
summary: Solar Foods starts large-scale production of its Solein protein made from air and electricity.

headline: Modern Meadow Announces New Bio-Based Textile Material
summary: Modern Meadow unveils a novel bio-based textile aimed at replacing synthetic fabrics.

headline: Perfect Day Announces New Ice Cream Flavors Using Animal-Free Whey
summary: Perfect Day expands its ice cream line with new flavors made with precision-fermented whey.

headline: BioMason Secures Funding to Scale Up Bio-Cement Production
summary: BioMason receives investment to expand production of its bio-cement bricks.

headline: Air Protein Launches First Product Line in Select Markets
summary: Air Protein's first consumer product made from air-based protein becomes available in test markets.

headline: Algiknit Partners with Fashion Brand for Algae-Based Apparel
summary: Algiknit collaborates with a fashion company to create clothing from algae-derived yarns.

headline: Nature's Fynd Announces Expansion into New Retail Locations
summary: Nature's Fynd's fungi-based products become available in more retail stores nationwide.

headline: Piñatex Pineapple Leather Used in New Sustainable Shoe Collection
summary: Piñatex, made from pineapple leaf fibers, is featured in a new line of sustainable footwear.
